Key: Phew, that should do it.

(Phew. I didn't expect to have after-school duties
today... No one's left in the classroom but me.)

(Well, I still have to get ready for dinner, but I have
time. I'll drop by the market to pick up some food.)
Oh...

(Come to think of it, Rinne said she's going to be
handling it. Then I have nothing else I can think of
doing. Hm... I guess I'll just go home and help Rinne.)

(Wait a minute... Now that Rinne and Maria are here,
not to mention tomorrow's meals, Rinne won't be able
to buy everything on her own, huh?)
Oh, Shido! I knew it! You're still here!
Tohka? Were you waiting for me?
Yeah! I wanted to go home with you!
Sorry, and thanks Tohka. Do you mind if I drop by the shopping district?

Hm? Oh, you're getting food for the teppan party
tonight? Rinne already went to get food...

Yeah, but considering tomorrow's food too, I figured
I should pick up some more.

I see! Of course I'll go with you! I was just getting
hungry.
Well... we're not going to go to go eat...
Question. Where do you plan on going, Shido?

Oh, the shopping district... Whoa, Yuzuru?! Were you
on duty today, too?

Affirmative. Yuzuru was also on duty. On a side note,
Kaguya made plans to go out with Yoshino, so she
has already graciously left us.

I-I see... It must be tough for you too, Yuzuru. So
you came to check in on me, then?

Right answer. I figured I might be able to go home
with you and we could hang out.
Hang out?

Information. Currently there is a local gourmet festival
happening in the shopping district. Would you like to
swing by?

Local gourmet festival? Then does that mean we get
to eat something delicious?

Indeed. There are special items and dishes from
various local regions. There are food trucks as well,
so I'm sure you'd enjoy it, Tohka.
Whoa! That sounds great!
I see. I may be able to buy something interesting.

Wise eyes. I believe you will be bombarded with foods
you normally do not have access to.
All right. Let's swing by, then.

(Rinne should be buying stuff for dinner, but if I find
something interesting, I think I'll buy it.)

I wonder what kind of food trucks there are... I can't
wait!
Hey, don't forget about dinner, okay?
It'll be fine. I'll only just nibble.
As long as we're clear...

(Well it's Tohka, I guess I don't have to worry about
her.)
Whoa.... There are a lot of people here.

Assumption. It must be because of the gourmet
festival. However it appears that the placement of the
food truck may also be contributing to the problem.
Oh... Shido, this place smells so good!

Haha. I guess it's a pro of having the food truck here,
huh? Wow... There are so many kinds of food. It's
really amazing.

All right, then let's go check out the shop there.
I can't wait!

Hey, don't run, Tohka. We need to ask Yuzuru...
Wait, where is she?
Purchased. Sorry for the wait. Please eat this.

Yuzuru?! You were just gone for a second, and you've
already bought something?!
What are you holding?

Introducing. Yuzu juice from Shikoku. I heard it's great
for beauty too, so please try it out.

Yuzu? Oh, the sauce we used from the hot pot we
had the other day? Wouldn't you say it's too sour to
drink?

Correction. I believe you're talking about yuzu ponzu.
That just uses yuzu juice in the ponzu sauce. This is
a juice with yuzu juice and water.
(Yuzuru brought me a cup of juice and also for Tohka.)
These cups seem interesting...
Agreed. Supposedly all stores are using the same cup.

I see. Well, it is a festival, so I think unity is
important.
Affirmative. Yuzuru also thinks this is fine.

Ah, this tastes very good! The balance between sweet
and sour is perfect!

...Yeah. Tohka, you're really fast when it comes to
these things.

(I was impressed with Tohka and tried a sip of the
yuzu juice.)

Oh, you're right, Tohka. The scent of yuzu is strong,
but it's really mild and easy to drink.
Yeah. I feel energized.

Analysis. The organic sours in the yuzu are best for
recovering from fatigue. It also helps with heartburn
and pains in the liver.

Addition. There's also vitamin C and flavonoids used
as antioxidants to prevent sickness. It's of the
Rutaceae branch, but is stronger than the tangerine.

I see... In another words, the yuzu is in the same
family as the tangerine?

Well, they're definitely related... Yuzuru, you sure
are knowledgeable.

Affirmative. When I battled Kaguya in the past, I
researched various gourmet dishes across all regions.

I never knew you guys had such battles... How would
you even win that kind of competition...
Satisfied. Now let's try the black oden over there.

Whoa! What is that?! It's different from the usual
one!
Hey...! Wait, Tohka!

Delicious. It's different from ordinary oden. The
broth is delicious.
You're right. This is delicious. What is this powder?

That's broth powder. Black oden is different and
uses broth powder. It sounds delicious, doesn't it?

Yeah! Oh, I know! Shido, you should try it. You'd
better eat it when it's hot.
Oh, well, I...
Hurry up Shido. It'll be ruined if it's cold.
But that's...
(I'm embarrassed to do it in front of others...)
Come on! Open your mouth! Wide! AHHH!
O-Okay...
(I guess I have to brace myself.)
*Nom*... *chomp, chomp*...
What do you say? Is it good?
Yeah. The beef tendon makes the black oden so good.
That's great. It's so nice to eat delicious food together!
Yeah.
Envious. Are you favoring Tohka?
Not at all. She just gave me a piece...
Questionable. Then you mean... you don't mind if I do the same.
(And Yuzuru offered me some too.)
Oh um... Is that how it's going to be?
Request. Please open your mouth.

It doesn't have to be the same thing though. We can
go to another stand...

Negative. Shido, you always play it off like that. I want
you to open wide right here.
(Yuzuru won't back down... Fine.)
Ahh...
Praise. Ahh... Good job.
Mm... This is delicious!
Agreed. That was the most delicious among the dishes.

I thought it was the most delicious, too! I wonder what
that black thing was...

Thinking. I believe... it could be fishcake? But it feels
different...

It looks like it's chopped up, so it's hard to tell,
but it is fishcake. Black oden is all about the black
fishcake.

I see. So this is fishcake! I thought I tasted it before,
but I couldn't tell.

They've adjusted it for mass consumption, huh?
Chopping it up like this makes the broth seep in
better. You can only taste it at a place like this.

Agreed. Compared to the black oden I know, the taste
is seeping through. Now I understand why.

Well it could have been a coincidence, but if we
attribute it to the mastery of the chef, it seems even
more delicious.

Impressive. That's amazing, Shido. You're not the head
of the household for nothing.

Haha. Thanks. I'm glad we were able to have a nice
snack.
Snack? That wasn't a snack, that was oden right?

Answer. Depending on the location, they serve it at
snack stands as well. Children supposedly eat black
oden as a snack.

Oden as a snack, that's interesting. But I'm kind of
bummed that the others aren't here, especially since
it's a rare snack.

Then I'll try making it next time. Then we can all eat
it together.
That sounds great!
Affirmative. I'm sure everyone will be happy.

But we won't make it as a snack. It'll be dinner,
okay? If I serve it as a snack, I know for certain that
people won't be able to eat dinner.

Aww... That's unfortunate. But I can't wait to eat with
everyone!
Excited. I look forward to eating your oden, Shido.

All right. So let's head home now. I'm sure we should
be helping out with dinner.

Halt. Wait. There's an interesting place there. Is it
okay if I check it out?
Sure, but where are you going?
Rare taste. The aroma of spices is calling me.
(Yuzuru, you must be affected by Tohka.)

Discovery. I was finally able to purchase it. Let's all
taste it.
(Yuzuru brought it over with a smile. It was...)

Is that a curry soup ramen? It's like a ramen version
of curry udon... But the smell is different. Wait, is
this tonkotsu-based?

Affirmative. That's exactly what you said. It seems
like an unbelievable combination, but it seems to be
a dish made with passion. I was curious.

I see. But Yuzuru... Wouldn't you say that's pretty
heavy?

Agreed. Hence why I bought one for the three of us
to share. That way, it won't affect dinner too much.

Hmm... Well, you have a point, I guess. I guess we
can manage.
I'm totally fine, Shido.
Amazing, Tohka...

(She ate so much oden too... Actually, I wonder if I
can eat dinner after all this.)

(Before I knew it, Tohka had already put the noodles
in her mouth.)
Whoa. This is soooo good, Shido!

Satisfied. The combination of spices is great. Not
only for the nose, but it mesmerizes even the tongue...
It's as if I were put under a spell...
If you put it like that I'm really curious now.
(I guess I can take a bite...)

There's a lot of lard, and the soup is pretty thick,
but that makes the umami of the curry even stronger.
The flavors compliment each other so well...!

And the spices. Just as Yuzuru said, this is crazy!
Curry and tonkotsu ramen... Normally you'd think the
two wouldn't go together, but I'm really surprised!
(That was truly some miraculous gourmet...)
...Phew. My stomach's finally settled. Let's go home.

(We threw away our cans of iced tea in the trash can
next to the vending machine, and got up from the
bench.)
(The three of us devoured the curry ramen so quickly.)
Wait, Shido. I smell something odd over there.
Hm? That area is...
(I looked to follow where Tohka was pointing.)

(It's a flag. It looks like a flag waving in front of
the food trucks.)
(And next to the flag was a sign that read Italian
Italian... yakisoba? What is that?

Analysis. I believe it's pasta sauce on top of yakisoba.
Kind of like a westernized yakisoba. It does smell
different.

All right, let's go to that shop next! Let's go Shido,
Yuzuru!
H-Hey, wait! Hey, TOHKA!

(And in the end, we ended up going to three additional
places.)

(Of course after eating all that, Tohka was totally
fine.)
